input_text:
Job Title: Senior Salesforce Developer

Location: Washington DC-Baltimore Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Position Overview: Our client is seeking an experienced Senior Salesforce Lightning Developer to support one of their federal projects in Washington, D.C. This is a fantastic opportunity to leverage your previous Salesforce development experience and expertise. Your in-depth understanding of state models will be used to build workflow applications used to integrate external data.
Your future duties and responsibilities:Modernize the capabilities offered using the Salesforce PlatformSupport legacy data and business process to migrate into Salesforce platformImplement a workflow that tracks the complaint as it moves through the handling process and allows personnel to respond to complaints in an effective mannerIntegrate with the data platform to store and/or retrieve information relevant to the complaintUtilize MuleSoft's Anypoint Platform to design, develop and orchestrate APIs, and implement the new data exchange platform.Work closely with the Software Architect and other technical team members, government stakeholders, and subject matter experts in developing solutions on the Salesforce platform.Develop detailed technical integration architecture and design specificationsSupport integration and user acceptance testingSupport development and update of technical design documentsWork in close collaboration with Production Operations to complete release deployments, support release management documentation for production deployment readinessWorking knowledge of automated deployment / DevOps tools and technologiesWork with stakeholders to create and influence proper standards for development, governance, and operational lifecycle.Debug and troubleshoot issues that arise during development and testing.Identify ongoing risks and pain points throughout the project, develop and implement mitigation measures.Required qualifications to be successful in this role:BS in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, Business, or other related scientific or technical discipline.10 years of functional experience (5+ focused on Salesforce development using Apex and Visualforce)8 years of specialized experience (3+ implementing in Platform, Service and Experience Cloud)Solid understanding of and detailed experience with Salesforce.com architecture and APIExperience integrating Salesforce.com with other applicationsExperience with Lightning Web Components (LWC) framework, Experience CloudExperience with Agile development methodologiesDeep knowledge and experience in designing and implementing solutions in Salesforce along with integrating Salesforce to other platformsCertified Salesforce Platform Developer credential requiredExperience using MuleSoft and data pipelinesAbility to obtain a Public Trust clearanceNice to have’s:Salesforce Public Sector Solutions Accredited ProfessionalPreferred certifications: Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce Platform App Builder, Salesforce Architect, Salesforce Developer, Salesforce Service Cloud ConsultantCurrently hold a Public Trust clearance
Salary: Up to $172,000 Hybrid: Remote with onsite as needed 
This is a direct-hire, full time position with salary and benefits. The client provides a comprehensive benefits package, including Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Flexible Spending Account, and Paid Time Off (PTO)—including vacation and holiday pay.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Senior Salesforce Developer
output_json.summary: Experienced Senior Salesforce Lightning Developer sought for a federal project in Washington, D.C.
preferred_degrees: Other related scientific or technical discipline
required_skills: Salesforce development using Apex and Visualforce
Platform, Service and Experience Cloud implementation
optional_skills: Salesforce Public Sector Solutions Accredited Professional
tools_and_technologies: Automated deployment / DevOps tools and technologies
soft_skills: Ability to track and handle complaints
Working knowledge of automated deployment tools
job_responsibilities: Supporting legacy data and business processes
Collaborating with Software Architect and technical team
Supporting integration and user acceptance testing
Working with Production Operations for release deployments
Working with stakeholders for development and governance
output_json.company_information: Client provides a comprehensive benefits package including Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Flexible Spending Account, and Paid Time Off (PTO).
